summary.para: Gets the index of an item that the user wants to keep.

param.name: iChoice
param.para: Type: UINT
The item that the user wants to keep.

param.name: piChoiceIndex
param.para: Type: UINT*

The index into the conflict's item array. This value is passed to the resolver for subsequent conflicts in the same conflict set if the user chooses to apply the same operation to all selected conflicts of the same type from the same handler.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of items that the user wants to keep.

param.name: pcChoices
param.para: Type: UINT*
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the number of items that the user wants to keep.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets information about which conflict in a set of conflicts is being resolved.

param.name: pnCurrentConflict
param.para: Type: UINT*
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the index of the conflict in the set that is being resolved.

param.name: pcConflicts
param.para: Type: UINT*
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the number of conflicts that are being resolved.

param.name: pcRemainingForApplyToAll
param.para: Type: UINT*
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the number of the remaining conflicts to which an "apply to all" response would be applied.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets what kind of choice was made and whether to apply the choice to all subsequent conflicts in the set.

param.name: pnPresenterChoice
param.para: Type: *
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the choice that was made about the conflict resolution. One of the members of the enumeration.

param.name: pfApplyToAll
param.para: Type: BOOL*

When this method returns, contains a pointer to a flag. If TRUE, then the given choice is to be applied to all subsequent conflicts in the set, and and have information on how to apply this choice. Otherwise FALSE.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets what the presenter wants to do as the next step in the sync manager conflict resolution.

param.name: pnPresenterNextStep
param.para: Type: *
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the next step in conflict resolution. One of the members of the enumeration.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the array of indexes that represents which items the user wants to keep. This method is used when the user chooses to apply the same operation to all selected conflicts of the same type from the same handler.

param.name: prgiConflictItemIndexes
param.para: Type: UINT*
The array of indexes of items that the user wants to keep.

param.name: cChoices
param.para: Type: UINT
The number of item choices in prgiConflictItemIndexes.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets what kind of choice was made about a sync manager conflict resolution and whether to apply the choice to all subsequent conflicts in the set.

param.name: nPresenterChoice
param.para: Type:
The choice that was made about the conflict resolution. One of the members of the enumeration.

param.name: fApplyToAll
param.para: Type: BOOL
If TRUE, then apply the given choice to all subsequent conflicts in the set. In this case, must also be called.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets what the presenter wants to do as the next step in the sync manager conflict resolution.

param.name: nPresenterNextStep
param.para: Type:
The next step in the conflict resolution. One of the members of the enumeration.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that get and set information about sync manager conflict resolution.
